name: Alpen Appartment Relax
description:
Including: water, garbage, stream, final cleaning, culinary laundry and table linen, towels, bedclothes, central heating, … 
Exclusive: internet W-LAN 20 euros per week

Welcome to the flat TAKE IT EASY. Comfortably, in sunny panorama situation and surrounded from the beautiful mountains.
The comfortably furnished flatlet offers place for up to 7 people and lies at 1,100-m sea height.

Exit Zillertal, further on the B169 to direction Mayrhofen up to the local centre of Hippach/Ramsau. In Ramsau at the traffic light you cross the railway track up to the next crossroad, then turn right - in the direction of  „Zillertaler Höhenstrasse“ there you turn left. Drive up the Zillertaler Höhenstrasse up to the local sign "Klette"
Here on the right set off - after 100 m you can see our house.
